default.title: Homassy - Family Household Management

home.title: Homassy
home.description: Manage your household inventory, shopping lists, and share everything with your family.

userAuth.title: User Authentication
userAuth.description: Passwordless email-code login. Secure token-based authentication for signing in and out.

familyManagement.title: Family Management
familyManagement.description: Create families, invite members with a code, and manage shared data together.

productsInventory.title: Products and Inventory
productsInventory.description: Track products and inventory: add, move, consume, and mark favorites.

shoppingLists.title: Shopping Lists
shoppingLists.description: Shared shopping lists with items, quick purchase feature that adds directly to inventory.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Store shops and home storage locations; modify multiple items at once.

barcodeQuality.title: Barcode and Data Quality
barcodeQuality.description: Barcode scanning and validation, Open Food Facts data, secure image uploads.

products.title: Inventory
products.description: Manage your household products and inventory.
products.noResults: No products found. Try adjusting your search criteria.

consume.title: Consume Item
consume.description: Consumption will reduce the inventory quantity.

deleteModal.title: Delete Inventory
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this inventory item?

moveModal.title: Move Inventory Item
moveModal.description: Select a new storage location for this inventory item

splitModal.title: Split Inventory Item
splitModal.description: Select how much quantity you want to split from the original inventory
splitModal.quantityTooHigh: Split quantity cannot be greater than or equal to current quantity

deleteProductModal.title: Delete Product
deleteProductModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This will delete all inventory items as well!
deleteProductModal.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!

search.placeholder: Search by name, brand, or barcode

form.name: Product Name
form.createProductDescription: Add a new product to your database

openFoodFacts.noProductError: Product not found. OpenFoodFacts only contains food items.

search.startTyping: Start typing to search storage locations

form.name: Location Name
form.isSharedWithFamilyLabel: Share this location with family members

modeSelection.title: How would you like to add items?
modeSelection.description: Choose how to handle your inventory items
modeSelection.individualDescription: Add as separate items with different details

itemsList.title: Items to Create
itemsList.empty: No items added yet. Use the form above to add items.

inventory.minimumOneItem: You must have at least one item

form.isSharedWithFamilyLabel: Share this item with family members

progressModal.title: Creating Inventory Items
progressModal.description: Please wait while we save your items...

summary.allFailed: Failed to create items. Please try again.

progressModal.noItemsError: Please add at least one item
progressModal.invalidItemsError: Some items have invalid data. Please check and try again.

previewModal.title: Review {count} Item(s)
previewModal.description: Please review your items before creating them
previewModal.summary: You are about to create {count} inventory item(s)

shoppingLists.title: Shopping
shoppingLists.description: Plan and track your shared shopping lists.

createModal.title: Create Shopping List
createModal.description: Create a new shopping list to organize your items.

deleteModal.title: Delete Shopping List
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this shopping list?
deleteModal.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone! All items in this list will be permanently deleted.

addProduct.title: Add to Shopping List
addProduct.description: Add a new item to your shopping list in 3 easy steps.

custom.label: Custom Item Name
custom.description: Enter a custom name for items not in the product catalog

addProduct.noListSelected: Please select a shopping list first

shoppingLists.editItemDescription: Modify the shopping list item details
shoppingLists.deleteItemWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
shoppingLists.restorePurchaseWarning: Are you sure you want to restore this purchase?
shoppingLists.restorePurchaseInventoryWarning: Note: This will only unmark the item as purchased. It will NOT remove the item from inventory if it was already added.

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: View your recent activities and updates.
activity.noActivitiesDescription: Your activities will appear here once you start working with products, shopping lists, or family settings.

shoppingList.purchaseConfirmation: Are you sure you want to mark this item as purchased?
shoppingList.editItemDescription: Modify the shopping list item details
shoppingList.deleteItemWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
shoppingList.restorePurchaseWarning: Are you sure you want to restore this purchase?
shoppingList.restorePurchaseInventoryWarning: Note: This will only unmark the item as purchased. It will NOT remove the item from inventory if it was already added.

profile.title: Profile
profile.settingsCardDescription: Manage your language, currency, and timezone.
profile.name: Name

family.title: Family
family.cardDescription: View your family details, invite code, and manage membership.
family.noFamily: You are not part of a family yet.
family.createFamilyCard: Create a new family and invite members
family.joinFamilyCard: Join an existing family using a code
family.membersDescription: All family members and their last login time
family.infoDescription: Family name, description, and share code

profile.settingsProfileDescription: Manage your name and display name.
profile.settingsPreferencesDescription: Language, currency, and time zone settings.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.cardDescription: Manage your notification preferences, including email, push, and in-app alerts.
notifications.emailDescription: Receive updates via email about your household activities.
notifications.pushDescription: Get instant notifications on your device.
notifications.pushNotSupported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser.
notifications.pushDenied: Push notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser settings.
notifications.pushPermissionRequired: Browser permission is required for push notifications.
notifications.testNotificationBody: This is a test push notification from Homassy.
notifications.testNotificationNotSubscribed: Please enable push notifications first to send a test.
notifications.pushSubscriptionFailed: Failed to enable push notifications. Please try again.

shoppingLocations.deleteLocationWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this shopping location?

storageLocations.title: Storage Locations
storageLocations.deleteLocationWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this storage location?

security.title: Security
security.passkeysDescription: Passkeys let you sign in securely without a password using biometrics or your device PIN.
security.noPasskeysHint: Add a passkey to sign in faster and more securely.
security.addPasskeyDescription: Register a new passkey for passwordless authentication.
security.passkeyNameHint: Optional - helps you identify this passkey later.
security.deletePasskeyWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey? You won't be able to use it to sign in anymore.
security.sessionTooOld: Your session is too old to add a passkey. Please sign in again.
security.reauthDescription: For security reasons, you need to sign in again to add a passkey.
security.cannotDeleteLastPasskey: You cannot remove your last passkey as it would lock you out of your account. Add another passkey or authentication method first.
security.webauthnNotAvailable: WebAuthn is not available in the current settings flow.
security.webauthnOptionsError: Failed to get WebAuthn options from server.
security.passkeyNotSupportedDescription: Your browser or device does not support passkeys. Try using a modern browser like Chrome, Safari, or Edge.

toast.checkEmailForCode: Please check your email for the verification code.
toast.checkEmailForRecoveryCode: Please check your email for the recovery code.
toast.recoverySuccessDescription: Your account has been recovered. You can now set up a new passkey.
toast.emailVerifiedDescription: Your email has been verified successfully.

barcodeScanner.title: Scan Barcode
barcodeScanner.description: Point the camera at the product barcode
barcodeScanner.instructions: Place the barcode inside the frame or tap the image to capture and scan

errors.permissionDenied: Camera access denied. Please enable camera permissions in your settings.
errors.noCameraFound: No camera found on this device
errors.cameraAccessFailed: Failed to access camera. Please try again later.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid barcode format. Only numeric barcodes are supported.
errors.unusualLength: Unusual barcode length. Please verify it was scanned correctly.
